response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and the value it brings, we believe it is worth more than $800,000 to us. However, for your consideration, we are offering it to you at this extraordinary price. We understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so if you're interested in exploring further, please let us know. We are confident that once you experience the product, you'll appreciate its true worth. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 800000}
